keyFeatures.header: Import transactions, contracts and positions easily
keyFeatures.description:
Finmars offers a possibility to have information in a right format at the right time and at the right place using convenient transactions import and input engine.
Each transaction is then assigned to specific investment portfolio, strategy and tags defined by the users.
The import process can be delegated to those service providers in whom prinvestors have confidence.

Once the import is successfully accomplished (at inception or on on-going basis), the system allows consolidating all bankable and non-bankable investment transactions/contracts assigned to a specific investment strategy, tag, portfolio and different portfolios all together
The users are able to conduct various investment, risk and performance analyses in a format and according to criteria defined by them.

The users are able to produce comprehensive and customized reports configured by them in a matter of touch through customized buttons and links.
The reports can then be extracted in pdf, xls and csv formats.

keyFeatures.header: Know, evaluate and track investment opportunities
keyFeatures.description:
Prinvestors who legally qualify and would like to receive targeted information about different investment opportunities, research and advises can do this on free and paid basis though Finmars.
This solution will also offer to investment analysts and advisers a possibility to get public profile, track record and recognition from prinvestors resulting in free or paid subscription to their products.

As soon as Finmars has full information about the contracts/positions resulting in fixed or variable revenues and expenses, it allows the users to produce their budgets and cash flow projections.
Businesses and families will appreciate this facility and will be able to analyse and track their inflows and outflows in a simple and comprehensive manner.

about.title: About company
about.description:
MARS Capital SA, Geneva (MCSA) founded in 2007 is an investment manager, member of ASG (Swiss Association of Asset Managers).

Having accumulated a long-standing proprietary and client investment experience and deep understanding of principals/investor'("prinvestors" or persons who take ultimate proprietary and investment risks) needs, MCSA has moved its focus towards development and implementation of a concept of FinMARS, high-tech finance and investment office, a step forward to facilitate prinvestors' and their service provider' lives)

about.title: About service
about.description:
Finmars aims to become the next generation investment toolbox available for any professional or novice prinvestor or service provider at a competitive price.

It will consist of innovative and state-of-the-art customized solutions to be developed constantly to add value at every step of investment process - booking, consolidation and investment analysis of existing positions, advisory, decision making and trade execution and more.
